Raised $1.75M from Intel Capital, CrunchFund, PlentyofFish and Western Tech Investments to build LikeIt.com, a social dating site which offered a fun way to discover people, places, and things through the social graph, interest graph and social games.  • Grew Facebook app & iPhone app to 13M profiles by using paid acquisition, fun social games and encouraging people to share their 2.2M unique interests.• Likeit.com offered social and interest graph search beyond Facebook, allowing users to create self-updating profiles of their favorite music, movies, books, hobbies, sports and friends from Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google+, Photobucket, Flickr, Foursquare, and Goodreads.  • Built the Facebook PPC acquisition channel, achieved a 225% reduction in CPC with 350% increase registered users.

Oversaw marketing & product development, $30M marketing budget and team of 18.• Drove revenue from $20M to $60M and achieved a S-1 filing.• Architected the growth of Google SEM spend from $0 to $30M/year and became a top 100 spender in Google with 40% gross margin.• Drove profitable growth across channels: SEM, Facebook, CPA, SEO, Display, Publishers and Email.• Conceived, patented and launched the Click Marketplace, delivered 30% of company's gross margin.• Built the publisher business, initiated $60M acquisition of MerchantCircle.com.• Oversaw the development of hundreds of sites including Contractor.com and Reply.com.

Vinay M. Vadgama
Independent Email Marketing and Deliverability Consultant
February 25, 2013, Brian managed Vinay M. directly

Vinay has strong organizational, analytical and communication skills with solid attention to details and a strong sense of ownership. Despite working remotely, he had the ability to take corrective action, multitask and respond quickly to shifting priorities, identifying root cause and predicting trends. Vinay aligned Reply! email operation and email marketing mailing practices with the best-practices to help us build our email business. Vinay single-handedly developed and deployed hands-on daily messaging programs, contact strategy, list segmentation, email validation and creative optimization.  He is a pleasure to work with and solid team contributor. I recommend him to anyone seeking assistance with their email.
